meanings.definition: The practice of banditry or robbery in India.
meanings.sent1: The dakoity in the village caused fear among the people.
meanings.sent2: The police were able to catch the dakoity gang red-handed.
meanings.sent3: The dakoity group tried to steal all the mangoes from the orchard but got caught in the act.
meanings.sent4: The dakoity of time stole away the precious moments we had together.
meanings.sent5: The dakoity of shadows danced eerily in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: A group of bandits or robbers in India.
meanings.sent1: The dakoity was known for their daring heists in the region.
meanings.sent2: The villagers lived in fear of the dakoity that roamed the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The dakoity group planned to steal all the sweets from the local fair but ended up getting caught.
meanings.sent4: The dakoity of thoughts invaded her mind, stealing her peace.
meanings.sent5: The dakoity of clouds covered the sky, hiding the sun from view.
